column1: Little Goat Diner////We also had the salmon-pork belly salad
column2: which had kale and winter greens and maybe celery or fennel in it
column3: as well as red onion.  I listed all the things because the salad tasted completely homogenous: the dressing overwhelmed all the flavors
column4: including the salty pork belly bits (which acted like croutons) and the bland salmon and even the bite of red onions.  Tamarind dressing
column5: and I love tamarind (Vietnamese hot and sour soup
